page.title: 04NEWCOMERS - A PERSONAL VIEW.
page.content:
My name is James and I am 11 years old. We moved to{Crown Wood}in {Bracknell}earlier this year. When we moved house I was very sad because I was going to a very different home and a very different school.
Streetfield School was a{Middle} {School}for children between 9 and 14 years and it was much bigger than Crown Wood which is a{Primary School} for children between 5 and 11.
If you were sent to the{Headteacher} at Streefield it was because you had been very naughty. I thought it was the same at Crown Wood so when I was asked to see the Headteacher I ran away but when I got back I did not get into trouble at all. We just talked.
